base.card: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-neutral-200 overflow-hidden transition-all duration-200

product.base: group relative bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-neutral-200 overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer

image.img: w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-300 group-hover:scale-105

badge.base: absolute top-2 left-2 z-10 px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-md

actions.container: absolute top-2 right-2 z-10 flex flex-col space-y-1 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200
actions.button: w-8 h-8 bg-white rounded-full shadow-md flex items-center justify-center text-neutral-600 hover:text-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 transition-colors duration-200

category.base: group relative h-64 rounded-lg overflow-hidden cursor-pointer transition-transform duration-300

image.img: w-full h-full object-cover transition-transform duration-300 group-hover:scale-110

category.overlay: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/60 via-black/20 to-transparent

content.container: absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 p-4 text-white
content.title: text-xl font-bold mb-1
